body:
You can style the tooltip text elements and other items to make them smaller. At what point this becomes unreadable is up to your user testing. Something like:

tooltip: {
  formatter: function() {
    return '<b>' + this.series.name + '</b>: ' + this.point.y
  },
  style: {
    "color": "#333333",
    "cursor": "default",
    "fontSize": "10px", //default is 12px
    "padding": "1px", //default is 8px
    "pointerEvents": "none",
    "whiteSpace": "nowrap"
  }
},

Here I have set the padding to 1px and the fontSize to 10px.
title: How to show tooltip properly for highchairs when height is small?
